content.text: Hi, I'm [user 2's name]. It's nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you too. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play tennis, read, and watch funny movies.
Those are all great hobbies! I love to play tennis too. What's your favorite kind of movie?
I love comedies, especially ones with a lot of slapstick humor.
Me too! I love watching old Charlie Chaplin movies.
Those are great! I also love watching the Marx Brothers movies.
Me too! They're so funny. What's your favorite type of music?
I like all kinds of music, but I especially love listening to classic rock.
Those are great! I love classic rock too. What's your favorite band?
I love the Beatles, the Rolling Stones, and Queen.
Those are all great bands! I love the Beatles too. What's your favorite song by the Beatles?
I love "All You Need Is Love." It's such a beautiful and positive song.
Me too! It's one of my favorite songs by them. I love the message of the song.
It's a great message. I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
